title: Enneagram Transformations: Releases and Affirmations (epub, mobi
description:
Title: Enneagram Transformations: Releases and Affirmations

Author: Don Richard Riso
Publisher: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt
Publication date: 01/29/1993
ISBN13: 9780395657867
ISBN10: 0395657865


Summary
-------
Don Riso briefly, but eloquently, explores the nine Enneagram types in an effort to help identify the times when these types are stressed and affirmations to help bring them back to their center.


Description
-----------
This new book makes a groundbreaking contribution to the self-help field. These moving Releases and Affirmations offer a profound psychological inventory of our inner pain and our personal strengths. They will be useful in all forms of Recovery, such as Twelve Step programs and Inner Child and Codependency work. Anyone already using Riso's books will find these meditations an invaluable new tool for their self-development.

* Enneagram Transformations - Don Riso.epub (309kb)
